1.content:
Bored out of your mind, you stare at the monitor. The forecast called for a light shower. They were wrong. The night will be filled with nothing but rain and wind. A wasted evening so far. At least tomorrow is the weekend.

         You slump into your green gaming chair. The monitor's bright screen was tiring your eyes. A can of Pepsi and a small bag of cheerios kept you going.

         Paying for Photoshop is not your goal. A trial should do the trick. You only needed it to edit photos for your homework. Arriving at a website of a distro, you hit download without thinking. Sleep was getting harder to fight off. You went to bed, as the download progressed. But it wasn't Photoshop...

***


         You woke up, feeling somewhat refreshed. You hear the engine of your mother's car. You gasped. Like a surprised cat, you leaped out of bed. You went to your window, sliding it open. You frowned, seeing her backing up.

         "Lewis!" You flinched from the voice. "Mom said you're babysitting us! No leaving the house!" Jessica's voice sounded like nails scraping on a chalkboard.

         You groaned. You're left with your sisters again. You hoped at least one day they will tag along with her for a, "bring your daughter to work" day. Luck wasn't feeling up to it. You scratched head, with irritable feeling.

         You took that thought out of your mind. Photoshop was more important. You made your way to your computer, noticing an odd quirk. On the screen, it said: Thank you for downloading, Photomerge. Enjoy your fusion fun!

         "The fuck?" You sat down in your chair. "Photomerge..." You launch the program. You stared at the splash screen before it instructed you to put in two photos of people.

         Curious, you decided to do what it told you. Looking at photos of fusions would amuse you. Although, the thought of merging with Hannah stirred your arousal. What about Kim and Mike? Looking at your photos on your computer, you wondered.

         Hannah and Kim merged together. Mike and your sisters? Or, a hot cheerleader fusion as a best friend? Your imagination was guiding you. But, you have no idea of its true purpose...
1.title: "Thank you for downloading, Photomerge."

info.description:
You have downloaded a strange version of Photoshop, and you can merge people into all sorts of hybrids...

This story is based on the original Photomerge. It was an interactive by lilmalawi that used to be hosted on this site. I've decided to reboot this story after it got deleted.

Much like the original, expect sexual scenarios to happen. However, there should never be any NSFL content in the story (no guro, no scat, no water sports, etc). The story is moderated, but don't fret. I will edit for spelling errors, etc.

Also, if you like the concept of merging, and some other kinks please join my discord server. You can even discuss about the story there, along with another one called, Merge Necklace: https://discord.gg/DQKxG35.

*****The Original Cast of Characters UPDATED*****


Lewis: [This is you!] A 16 year old boy, and sophomore. A young average Joe, living a typical life. Light skin, with short black hair and blue eyes. Athleticism isn't your strong point. 5ft 6in~.

Jessica: A 14 year old girl. One of your young twin sisters. She and Jennifer are mean and annoying. You rarely get along with them. She loves accessories. 5ft 4in~.

Jennifer: Your other younger sister. She is just like Jessica in every regard. She keeps her hair in a ponytail. Both twins have long black hair and light blue eyes. 5ft 4in~.

Helen: A 44 year old brunette single mother. As a business woman, she is preoccupied with work. She doesn't have enough time to be at home. However, she loves you and your sisters very much. 5ft 7in~.

Hannah: A cute redhead at age 16. She is your girlfriend. She is a busty girl, with a comparable rear. Her freckles puts a delight in your face. 5ft 5in~.

Mike: A 16 year old like you. Your best friend since childhood. You treat each other as brothers. He is tall and a jack of all trades at sports. Has a great tan, making his green eyes stand out. 5ft 8in~.

Kim: A 17 year old junior. As the head cheerleader, she is the hottest girl at school. Long light brown and a fair skin tone goes well with her, dark brown eyes. 5ft 7in~.

Jake: An 18 year old head football player. He is the most popular guy at school. His styled dark hair and fine tan are staples of his strong look. 6ft~.
